validation_rules: bc_vri01_wetland_validation(inventory_standard_cd, l1_species_cd_1, l1_species_pct_1, l1_species_cd_2, non_productive_descriptor_cd, l1_non_forest_descriptor, land_cover_class_cd_1, soil_moisture_regime_1, l1_crown_closure, l1_proj_height_1, 1)
description: Translate all rows that produce a wetland code. Check wetland code exists by looking at first character. Note some codes don't have all four characters but they all have the first character.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: bc_vri01_wetland_validation(inventory_standard_cd, l1_species_cd_1, l1_species_pct_1, l1_species_cd_2, non_productive_descriptor_cd, l1_non_forest_descriptor, land_cover_class_cd_1, soil_moisture_regime_1, l1_crown_closure, l1_proj_height_1, 1)

description: Validate there is a code to return. Translation converts source attributes into 4-character wetland code and returns the code corresponding to the first character.
